body: Lmao she had mole exact spot like me ...

A shota story with a relatively slow pace, that's quite a relief from all the shotas who suddenly act like a**holes the moment they think having a big D, no matter how old you are, is reason enough to treat women like onaholes/pets/playthings, using blackmail or mind-breaking rape to have their way if need be. That being said, this story might have a sequel so…
